item.title: Simplified Guide: Setting Up a Local Domain with Caddy Server
item.description: Introduction In the realm of web development and local testing environments, creating custom local domain can streamline the devepment process. this guide walks you the steps to set up a new local domain using Caddy Server Prerequisites CaddyServer: make sure you have caddy installed on your system, if you haven’t installed it yet, You can download and install it from the official Caddy website Text Editor (vscode,vim, etc…), have a text editor of your choice.
